name: ext_R3_ClaimResponse_payment
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ClaimResponse.payment for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ClaimResponse.payment from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClaimResponse|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Payment details for the claim if the claim has been paid.
element.comment: `ClaimResponse.payment` has no related element in R2:ClaimResponse

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element.
